description: See everything in the game world

features.title: Ghost ESP
features.description: See ghosts through walls with customizable colors and distance indicators. Instantly know where the ghost is at all times, even during hunts.

features.title: Player ESP
features.description: Track teammates through walls with name tags and distance indicators. Never lose sight of your team, even in the largest maps.

features.title: Evidence ESP
features.description: Highlight all evidence items through walls, making investigations quick and efficient. Find ghost orbs, fingerprints, and other evidence immediately.

features.title: Fusebox ESP
features.description: Locate fuseboxes through walls, allowing you to quickly restore power when the ghost turns it off.

features.title: Ghost Window
features.description: Display detailed ghost information in a separate window, including ghost type, hunting status, and activity level.

features.title: Activity Monitor
features.description: Monitor ghost activity levels and interactions in real-time.

features.title: Watermark
features.description: Optional watermark showing Asthmaphobia version and FPS counter.

features.title: NoClip
features.description: Walk through walls, doors, and any solid object in the game. Access areas that would normally be inaccessible.

features.title: Speed Hack
features.description: Adjust your movement speed to move faster or slower than normal. Configurable with hotkeys for quick adjustments.

features.title: Infinite Stamina
features.description: Run indefinitely without getting tired. Never slow down when sprinting, even with heavy equipment.

features.title: Teleport
features.description: Instantly teleport to any location on the map, including the ghost, teammates, or specific coordinates.

features.title: Ghost Modifier
features.description: Modify ghost properties like speed, visibility, and hunting behavior. Make the ghost more or less aggressive as desired.

features.title: Ghost Interactor
features.description: Force the ghost to interact with objects, create EMF readings, or perform specific actions remotely.

features.title: God Mode
features.description: Become invulnerable to ghost attacks and environmental damage. Survive hunts without hiding.

features.title: Player Modifier
features.description: Modify player attributes like sanity level, carrying capacity, and interaction range.

features.title: Custom Name
features.description: Change your in-game name to anything, including special characters and formatting.

description: Manipulate cursed items for your advantage

features.title: Cursed Item Modifier
features.description: Modify the behavior and effects of cursed items like the Ouija Board, Music Box, and Summoning Circle.

features.title: Force Card
features.description: Force specific Tarot Card draws from the deck, guaranteeing beneficial cards like 'The Fool' or 'The High Priestess'.

description: Manipulate the game world and environment

features.title: Door Modifier
features.description: Control all doors remotely, including locked doors and closets.

features.title: Anti-Kick
features.description: Prevent being kicked from multiplayer lobbies, even by the host.

features.title: Free Mouse Look
features.description: Look around freely while dead or in equipment view mode.

features.title: Leave People
features.description: Force other players to leave the game or disconnect them from the lobby.

features.title: Pickup
features.description: Manipulate item pickup mechanics and interactions.

features.title: Reward Modifier
features.description: Modify mission rewards and experience points earned after completing contracts.
